Scheme 5: Benzoylation reaction of different substituted styrenes6a–ewith 2H-indazole1aa,b.aReaction conditions: 2-(4-methoxyphenyl)-2H-indazole1a(0.5 mmol), substituted styrenes6a–e(1.0 mmol), TBPB (1.25 mmol), PhCl, N2atm, 110 °C, 24 h.bIsolated yield
